stagnant.translation[0].definitions[0].d: stagnant water or air does not move or flow and often smells bad
stagnant.translation[0].definitions[1].d: not changing or making progress, and continuing to be in a bad condition
stagnant.translation[0].definitions[1].e: a government plan to revive the stagnant economy
stagnant.translation[1].definitions[0].d: not changing, developing, or making progress
stagnant.translation[1].definitions[0].e: Corporate profits are slumping  (=falling suddenly) because of a  stagnant domestic economy.
